title: Taco DB
shortDescription: • C++17, POSIX, Linux, GTest. Disk-backed RDBMS with slotted pages and buffer pool manager for high disk↔memory throughput. • Persistent B+ Tree index with bulk-load + range scans; searches cut from O(N) to O(log N). • Iterator engine with seq scans, selections, projections, aggregations, joins, external merge sort for data beyond RAM. • Tuned physical plans (Index-NLJ) for TPC-H workloads to reach sub-second execution under memory constraints.
